name: Figma LCH Plugin
description: A color picker plugin that introduces LCH color space into Figma.

name: Nutrition Helper
description: Built on top of a neural network model, this app calculates human energy requirements with precision superior to that of existing methods.

name: Where Do I Sit?
description: A prototype of a service that keeps track of available seats in suburban trains. Awarded 2nd place in Samsung's Internet of Things competition.

name: Yeelight Chrome
description: This chrome extension allows you to connect to your Xiaomi Yeelight devices via LAN and control them using an intuitive user interface.
